name: getimagesize
purpose: Get the size of an image
errors:
If accessing the filename image is impossible, or
   if it isn't a valid picture, getimagesize will
   generate an error of level E_WARNING. On read error,
   getimagesize will generate an error of level
   E_NOTICE.

notes.description: This function does not require the GD image library.

changelog.change:
Read errors generated by this function downgraded to
        E_NOTICE from E_WARNING.

Support for JPC, JP2,
        JPX, JB2, 
        XBM, and WBMP became available.

JPEG 2000 support was added for the imageinfo
        parameter.

bits and channels are present
        for other image types, too.

Support for SWC and IFF was
        added.

Support for BMP and PSD was
        added.
